security: Sharing the internal routing process and the fact that Jane Roman will prepare a blind memo to the FBI could reveal coordination methods and compromise information-sharing channels between the CIA and FBI.
summary: A routing slip indicating that Jane Roman reviewed a cable and will prepare a blind memo to the FBI on the same topic.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a routing slip documenting the review of a cable by Jane Roman, who, after reviewing the original copy, will prepare a blind memorandum to the FBI regarding the cable's subject matter. The routing slip was generated by Robert Montgomery (IN03340) in Zurich at 1610 hours.
title: Official Routing Slip
